summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackMad Hippie's Jelly Cleanser is a hydrating, mildly acidic jelly-to-milk cleanser with an antioxidant boost! Melt away dirt, impurities & bad vibes without disrupting the skin's natural acid mantle.
details: DetailsKey IngredientsHyaluronic Acid - A moisture-binding natural active, hyaluronic acid delivers deep hydration to the skinResveratrol - Super potent antioxidant with powerful anti-aging propertiesSodium PCA - Derived from amino acids, sodium PCA is a naturally occurring humectant in the skin with high water absorbing qualities. Works to effectively hydrate the skin by absorbing and binding moisture to the skinSea Buckthorn Berry - This berry native to the Tibetan Himalayas, is rich in vitamins A, B, C, D, E, K, P, carotenoids, flavonoids, phenols, folic acid & fatty acids. In fact, the buckthorn berry is thought to be the only plant in the world to contain omega 3, 6, 7 & 9 all together.Rose - Rich in antioxidants & minerals, rose acts as a gentle astringentWhite Tea - Delicately harvested new growth tea leaves rich in antioxidantsChamomile - This calming, antioxidant-rich herb soothes the skin, and helps reduce the appearance of rednessFormulated WithoutParabens, SLS, petrochemicals, phthalates, silicone, synthetic fragrance and dyes.FeaturesRemove makeup, excess oil, pollution, and grime that rinses away without residue, leaving skin soft and clean11 ActivesTube made of sustainably harvested sugarcane bioresinRecyclable through TerraCycleItem 2592669How To UseWet face. Gently massage into skin for 30 seconds. Rinse.IngredientsCaprylic Capric Triglycerides, Glycerin [Vegan], Water, Sucrose Laurate, Sucrose Stearate, Decyl Glucoside, Squalane [Vegan], Phenethyl Alcohol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexyl Glycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate Acid, Sodium PCA, Tocopherol, Rosa Centifolia Flower Extract, Resveratrol, Kakadu Plum (Terminalia Ferdinandiana) Fruit Extract, Euterpe Oleracea (Acai) Fruit Extract, Matricaria Recutita (Chamomile) Flower Extract, White Tea (Camellia Sinensis) Leaf Extract, Sea Buckthorn (Hippophae Rhamnoides) Fruit Extract, Lime (Citrus Aurantifolia) Oil [Steam Distilled].
how_to_use: Wet face. Gently massage into skin for 30 seconds. Rinse.

reviews.headline: Takes off makeup so easy
reviews.comments: If you wear makeup but also have dry skin then this is the best cleanser out there.  I love the smell and watching it go from a gel to milk when I add water.  So glad I can now get this at ulta.

reviews.headline: If you have dry skin - this is it!
reviews.comments: I have very dry skin and have been searching for a cleanser that will take off my makeup without stripping my skin.  This is my new holy grail!  My skin is so frickin' soft after use that I just love it.  If you have oily skin, it might be too much for you, but for anyone with dry skin get it!

reviews.headline: Would not reccomend
reviews.comments: Smell is super plastic-y and it made my face break out so bad after use. It also feels like it clogged my pores and didn't clean my face at all.

reviews.headline: Best cleanser ever
reviews.comments: Efficient at breaking down long wearng makeup. Spritz water onto my face to emulsify it. Then wipe off with a damp washcloth. Face is soft and smooth. I don't even need a second cleanse. This has been my holy grail cleanser for a couple of years now.

reviews.headline: Whole face swelling after using
reviews.comments: At first loved this cleanser. After a week of using it my face randomly swelled up and was very itchy. I had to take zyrtec and benadryl to calm the swelling. 0/10. Do not recommend.

reviews.headline: Smells way too strong
reviews.comments: The scent is like perfume and the lid isn't my favorite. It's very gentle though but didn't feel strong enough for my skin needs.

reviews.headline: Truly does clean with NO foam!
reviews.comments:
Not sure why people are saying this leaves a film on their face... This leaves absolutely NO film on the skin. Unless the product was expired, perhaps. 
It transforms into a milk once applied to the skin, so it's very light with no foam. It has a very light rose and lime smell. It did NOT break me out at all. However, lime oil can be an acne or dermatitis trigger for many people, so keep that in mind. I have super sensitive skin and I had NO acne flare ups which was incredible.

reviews.headline: Love this face wash!
reviews.comments: I hughly recommend this face wash. I have struggled wifh acne and i couldnt find anyhting that cleared my skin up, but this did!

reviews.headline: Super moisturizing and takes off makeup
reviews.comments: This product turns from a gel to a milkk when you add water.  Its super hydrating but also does a great job taking off makeup.  I believe it would be categorized as an oil cleanse as that's what it seems to be mainly made of.  i love the consistency and how it makes my skin feel after using.

reviews.headline: new favorite
reviews.comments: i love this cleanser so much! i have horribly dry skin and this feels so nice to rub in i dont even wanna wash it off ðŸ˜­ and i love the way it makes my skin feel in the morning. my only complaint is that i really miss the old packaging design < /3

reviews.headline: My new favorite!
reviews.comments:
I love this face wash! I've recently had a major skin change and everything is drying my face out. I've always loved a cream cleanser, so I was a little skeptical about the jelly. It feels like heaven after I'm done. I've used the MH cream cleanser in the past and like it for the most part but it wasn't my favorite but it did a decent job. 
This one is way better!

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Love the jelly texture!! And i love the smell! It it has high ratings for the clean apps for ingredients! And it makes my skin feel good! I love mad hippie products. I do miss their old packaging, it was more fun. Lol.

reviews.headline: Pleasantly surprised!
reviews.comments: I picked this up since I was out of my gentle facial cleanser (it was on sale). I have dry skin, so I found this ridiculously hydrating. Some people say it leaves a film (the ppl with oily skin), but it made my skin feel firmly hydrated, which was a first for me, since other hydrating cleansers never have left me feeling THIS hydrated. it comes out as a thicc jelly, which turns liquidy milky when mixed with water. it won't foam, but just wash for 30 seconds like the directions say, and it does its magic. Washing it off was odd, because there wasn't much to wash away since your skin absorbs quite a bit of it, and there is no lather to wash away either. I love that there are some skincare actives that are in the formula, that I don't have in my basic routine. So it makes it even better for me! (resveratrol is so under rated). I used to adore the daily moisturizer, but ditched it last year because of how similar my serum was to it, and the serum was cheaper. I didn't realize how much I missed mad hippie tho! ðŸ’– The jelly is better than the cream cleanser, that just felt like lotion for your face. This one feels like it actually cleans my skin! Worth a shot for the dry skin gang âœ¨

reviews.headline: Magic
reviews.comments: I love the feel of this face wash.  A little goes a long way. After a couple of days I noticed a huge difference in how my skin felt and looked. Pores reduced,  black heads gone

reviews.headline: I enjoy it!
reviews.comments: I understand other peoples comments about this face wash, but I have been loving it. I have acne with rosacea and this cleanser has a load of rosacea friendly ingredients that doesnt trigger a flare up. I WILL say that this is not a cleanser that really foams up. If you want a foamy, Cerave like cleanser this is not that texture. It is definitely more a milk-like texture. Also i use this as my second cleanser when I double cleanse, i dont use it for removing makeup etc. I would recommend a cleansing balm beforehand as I dont think this product is strong enough to truly remove heavy makeup.

reviews.headline: Leaves a film on skin
reviews.comments: I usually love Mad Hippie products and decided to try the Jelly Cleanser. It leaves your face feeling like there is a film of product on it after cleansing. Not for me.

reviews.headline: So far i love it!
reviews.comments: Ive been using this for about a month!! Im planning on buying ny second bottle. I have oily acne prone skin and this doesnt seem to break me out at all. It doesnt really foam because it is more of an oil to milk cleanser but it keeps my skin super hydrated!

reviews.headline: more of a jelly to milk
reviews.comments:
cons: turns milky when applied to wet skin. does not leave a true clean feeling. made me breakout and is not to be used removing eyey makeup as it makes eyes sensitive 
pros: very light and non scented.

reviews.headline: Amazing skin
reviews.comments: This product has made my skin amazing! Been using it Twice a day. Please keep it going and don't change the ingredients as it has saved my skin! I love how hydrating and light the formula is

reviews.headline: the only cleanser you need
reviews.comments: I've been using this for two years now and love it!

faceoff_positive.comments: I picked this up since I was out of my gentle facial cleanser (it was on sale). I have dry skin, so I found this ridiculously hydrating. Some people say it leaves a film (the ppl with oily skin), but it made my skin feel firmly hydrated, which was a first for me, since other hydrating cleansers never have left me feeling THIS hydrated. it comes out as a thicc jelly, which turns liquidy milky when mixed with water. it won't foam, but just wash for 30 seconds like the directions say, and it does its magic. Washing it off was odd, because there wasn't much to wash away since your skin absorbs quite a bit of it, and there is no lather to wash away either. I love that there are some skincare actives that are in the formula, that I don't have in my basic routine. So it makes it even better for me! (resveratrol is so under rated). I used to adore the daily moisturizer, but ditched it last year because of how similar my serum was to it, and the serum was cheaper. I didn't realize how much I missed mad hippie tho! ðŸ’– The jelly is better than the cream cleanser, that just felt like lotion for your face. This one feels like it actually cleans my skin! Worth a shot for the dry skin gang âœ¨
faceoff_positive.headline: Pleasantly surprised!

faceoff_negative.comments: Like other reviews said, this left my face feeling even oilier than it was before, so i hated this in the beginning. However I'm loving it as a first step when I double cleanse. This is so good at getting all the makeup and sunscreen off my face without stripping it, plus I wear waterproof mascara a lot in the summer and this is so good at getting everything off without stinging my eyes at all! I can't even say that about makeup removers specifically meant for eyes. So if you bought this and don't like it as a primary cleanser, consider using it as a makeup remover, it works really well!
faceoff_negative.headline: Good For Double Cleanse
